casebody.data:
Ira K. GREER, Steven I. Greer, individually and as partners d/b/a Inland Wool Company, and Peerless Insurance Company, a corporation, v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 5588. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. March 9, 1957. Calvin L. Rampton, Salt Lake City, Utah, for petitioners. A. Pratt Kesler, U. S. Atty., Salt Lake City, Utah, for respondent.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, and HUXMAN, MURRAH, PICKETT and LEWIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Petition for writ of certiorari denied.
